post/2010/Tying Bits Together

summary
date

2010-03-04
tags

note/2010
posse
redirects

/post/2010/03/tying-bits-together

I’m working on tying together the blog and my site. A little JQuery magic expands the RSS feed of the Blogger blog for visitors to coolnamehere. I’ll improve the integration over time, probably by adjusting the template used for the blog. Meanwhile, I have more incentive to use Blogger.

I’ll probably add feeds from other services to the site, such as Buzz or Twitter. I use those frequently, and they are great for the short thoughts that don’t belong in either a blog post or a static page.
